info.title: Google Sheets API
info.description: API for interacting with Google Sheets

get.description: Retrieves all contact entries from the Contact sheet

post.description: Adds a new contact entry to the Contact sheet

put.description: Updates an existing contact entry in the Contact sheet

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contact to update

delete.description: Deletes a contact entry from the Contact sheet

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contact to delete
